title: The Cake Adventure
story: My mom is baking a cake. I love to eat cake. It's chocolate. Yummy. Is it ready yet? Almost. I get to put on the frosting. Lucky you. Can I help? Sure you can.  I love the frosting.
summary: Join a young child on an exciting cake-baking adventure filled with anticipation and the love for chocolate cake.
image: An image of a delicious chocolate cake with frosting on top.
